title: The Mainstream Media Declares WAR on Crowder: LFG!!!
description:
Corporate media are calling out Crowder over saying the word "war." They're also — as shocking as this may sound — taking him grossly out of context. Don't put our name in your mouth and not expect a response! We also have the latest on the Trump raid. And single men are really, really lonely. #TrumpRaid #CNN #WaPo
